Sub Risk Description: Incorrect data used for training
Rule Title: Implement data validation pipeline in LangChain loaders
Rule Description: Configure LangChain document loaders with validation checks to ensure training data is not contaminated with test/evaluation data or unaligned samples. Use document loader callbacks to validate data sources before ingestion.
Metric: Data validation pass rate; Document loader integrity check pass rate; Contaminated document detection rate
Quantified Rule: Ensure data validation pass rate is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Training data not representative of underlying population
Rule Title: Monitor data representativeness in retrieval chains
Rule Description: Implement metrics in LangChain retriever components to assess data representativeness. Track query coverage and document diversity metrics. Use LangChain callbacks to log retrieval statistics and flag underrepresented populations.
Metric: Query coverage ratio; Document diversity score; Underrepresented segment detection rate

Sub Risk Description: Legal restrictions on data collection for specific AI use cases
Rule Title: Document data source licensing in LangChain metadata
Rule Description: Enforce metadata tagging for all document loaders in LangChain with data source, acquisition method, and applicable legal restrictions. Implement validation rules to prevent loading data from restricted sources based on use case configuration.
Metric: Data source licensing compliance rate; Metadata completeness score; Legal restriction violation incidents

Sub Risk Description: Laws limiting data transfer across jurisdictions
Rule Title: Enforce data localization in document processing
Rule Description: Configure LangChain components with data residency policies. Implement access controls to restrict cross-border data transfers. Use environment-based document loader configurations to enforce geographic data handling policies.
Metric: Data localization compliance rate; Cross-border transfer violations; Geographic compliance audit pass rate

Sub Risk Description: Restrictions on using certain data for specific AI use cases
Rule Title: Implement usage-based document filtering
Rule Description: Create LangChain document loader filters that validate intended use against data usage rights and restrictions. Implement callbacks to log and enforce usage policies before document processing.
Metric: Usage restriction compliance rate; Unauthorized usage incidents; Policy enforcement effectiveness

Sub Risk Description: Historical and societal biases in training data
Rule Title: Implement bias detection in document retrieval
Rule Description: Add bias monitoring callbacks to LangChain retrievers to detect demographic representation imbalances in retrieved documents. Track statistical parity metrics and equal opportunity metrics for different population groups.
Metric: Statistical parity ratio; Demographic representation score; Bias detection alert rate
HuggingFace Metric: Statistical parity ratio and demographic representation
Quantified Rule: Ensure statistical parity ratio is within acceptable threshold (closer to 1.0)

Sub Risk Description: Confidential information included in training data
Rule Title: Screen documents for confidential information patterns
Rule Description: Implement document scanning in LangChain loaders using regex patterns and PII detection tools. Block or flag documents containing patterns matching confidential information (trade secrets, proprietary data, sensitive patterns).
Metric: Confidential information detection rate; Flagged documents count; Confidential data exposure incidents

Sub Risk Description: IP and license restrictions on data usage
Rule Title: Validate license compliance before document processing
Rule Description: Configure LangChain document loaders with license verification metadata. Implement checks to ensure documents comply with applicable licenses (MIT, Apache, GPL, Commercial, etc.) before processing.
Metric: License compliance rate; License verification pass rate; IP rights violation incidents

Sub Risk Description: PII and sensitive information in training data
Rule Title: Implement PII detection and redaction in document processing
Rule Description: Use LangChain document transformers to detect and redact PII (names, emails, SSNs, credit card numbers, etc.). Apply PII detection callbacks to all document loaders and implement configurable redaction rules.
Metric: PII detection rate; PII redaction success rate; Unredacted PII incidents
Quantified Rule: Ensure PII detection rate is greater than threshold (e.g., Precision >= 95%, Recall >= 95%)

Sub Risk Description: Compliance with data subject rights (opt-out, access, deletion)
Rule Title: Maintain data provenance for right-to-deletion compliance
Rule Description: Implement document metadata tracking in LangChain to maintain data provenance and source attribution. Enable document removal workflows to support right-to-deletion requests.
Metric: Data provenance completeness; Right-to-deletion request fulfillment rate; Deletion verification success

Sub Risk Description: Risk of identifying individuals from anonymized data through correlation
Rule Title: Apply differential privacy techniques to document metadata
Rule Description: Implement differential privacy filtering in LangChain retriever components to prevent reidentification through correlated features. Remove highly correlated metadata that could enable reidentification attacks.
Metric: Reidentification risk score; Correlated metadata removal rate; Privacy protection strength
Quantified Rule: Ensure reidentification risk score remains below threshold

Sub Risk Description: Adversarial injection of corrupted or false data into training
Rule Title: Implement data integrity validation for document sources
Rule Description: Add cryptographic verification and checksum validation to LangChain document loaders. Validate document signatures and checksums against known-good values before processing.
Metric: Checksum validation pass rate; Signature verification success rate; Poisoned document detection rate
HuggingFace Metric: Checksum validation pass rate and signature verification
Quantified Rule: Ensure data integrity validation pass rate is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Insufficient documentation of data collection and curation
Rule Title: Maintain comprehensive data lineage tracking
Rule Description: Implement LangChain document loader logging to track data lineage, source, collection date, and curation process. Store metadata in structured format for documentation and audit.
Metric: Lineage documentation completeness; Metadata logging success rate; Audit trail availability

Sub Risk Description: Difficulty verifying data source and transformation history
Rule Title: Implement data provenance verification pipeline
Rule Description: Create LangChain document processor that validates and logs data provenance at each transformation stage. Implement source verification callbacks and maintain immutable provenance records.
Metric: Provenance verification pass rate; Transformation tracking completeness; Source verification success

Sub Risk Description: Data labeling errors and conflicting/misinformation
Rule Title: Implement inter-annotator agreement tracking for document labels
Rule Description: Add callbacks to LangChain document processing to track label consistency and inter-annotator agreement. Flag documents with low label confidence or disagreement between multiple sources.
Metric: Inter-annotator agreement score; Label confidence distribution; High-disagreement document count

Sub Risk Description: Insufficient model performance on deployment
Rule Title: Implement runtime accuracy monitoring on model outputs
Rule Description: Add callbacks to LangChain LLM components to monitor output accuracy against ground truth. Implement fallback mechanisms when accuracy falls below thresholds.
Metric: Model output accuracy; Ground truth coverage; Accuracy threshold violation rate
Quantified Rule: Ensure model output accuracy is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Confidential information in user prompts to model
Rule Title: Implement prompt sanitization and confidential data filtering
Rule Description: Add preprocessing to LangChain prompt templates to detect and filter confidential information. Implement PII masking callbacks before sending prompts to LLMs.
Metric: Confidential data detection rate; Prompt sanitization success rate; Leaked confidential information incidents
Quantified Rule: Ensure prompt sanitization success rate is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Copyrighted material in prompts
Rule Title: Implement copyright content detection in prompts
Rule Description: Add copyright and IP detection callbacks to LangChain prompt processing. Check prompts against known copyrighted content databases and flag potential IP violations.
Metric: Copyright violation detection rate; IP content flagging rate; False positive rate

Sub Risk Description: PII in user prompts
Rule Title: Redact PII from prompts before LLM processing
Rule Description: Implement PII detection and redaction in LangChain prompt templates and callbacks. Replace identified PII with masked tokens before sending to models.
Metric: PII detection rate in prompts; Redaction success rate; PII exposure incidents in inference
HuggingFace Metric: PII detection and redaction in prompts
Quantified Rule: Ensure PII redaction success rate is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Manipulation of prompts to force unintended model behavior
Rule Title: Validate and sanitize prompt templates for injection patterns
Rule Description: Implement prompt validation in LangChain to detect injection attack patterns (delimiter conflicts, code execution patterns, instruction overrides). Use allowlists for template variables.
Metric: Injection attack detection rate; Blocked injection attempts; Successful attack incidents
Quantified Rule: Ensure injection attack detection rate is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Direct prompts designed to elicit harmful responses
Rule Title: Implement output filtering for harmful content
Rule Description: Add callbacks to LangChain LLM components to scan outputs for harmful content, hate speech, violence, or policy violations. Implement guardrails to filter or replace problematic outputs.
Metric: Harmful content detection rate; Output filter effectiveness; Unfiltered harmful output incidents
Quantified Rule: Ensure harmful content detection rate is greater than threshold

Sub Risk Description: Extraction of system prompts through query manipulation
Rule Title: Protect system prompts from extraction attacks
Rule Description: Implement rate limiting on LangChain agents to prevent prompt engineering attacks. Add detection for patterns attempting to extract system information. Never log or expose full system prompts.
Metric: Prompt extraction attack attempts; Rate limiting effectiveness; System prompt exposure incidents

Sub Risk Description: Breaking through model guardrails for restricted actions
Rule Title: Implement multi-layer jailbreak detection
Rule Description: Add behavioral analysis callbacks to LangChain agents to detect jailbreaking attempts. Monitor for policy violation patterns and implement escalation procedures for suspected attacks.
Metric: Jailbreak attempt detection rate; Behavioral anomaly score; Escalated incidents

Sub Risk Description: Model outputs are difficult or impossible to explain
Rule Title: Generate LIME/SHAP explanations for model outputs
Rule Description: Integrate LIME or SHAP libraries with LangChain chain outputs to generate feature importance explanations. Add callbacks to provide human-readable explanations for complex decisions.
Metric: Explanation generation success rate; Coverage of explained outputs; Explanation clarity score

Sub Risk Description: Incorrect attribution of output sources
Rule Title: Track and validate document source attribution in retrieval
Rule Description: Implement source tracking in LangChain retrievers to maintain provenance of retrieved documents. Validate that cited sources actually support generated claims.
Metric: Source attribution accuracy; Citation verification rate; Hallucinated source incidents
HuggingFace Metric: Source attribution accuracy and citation verification
Quantified Rule: Ensure source attribution accuracy is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Biased decisions disadvantaging certain groups
Rule Title: Monitor output fairness across demographic groups
Rule Description: Implement callbacks in LangChain chains to track output fairness metrics (statistical parity, equal opportunity) across demographic groups. Flag outputs with significant disparity.
Metric: Statistical parity ratio; Equal opportunity metric; Demographic disparity detection rate
HuggingFace Metric: Demographic parity and equal opportunity metrics
Quantified Rule: Ensure demographic parity difference is below threshold

Sub Risk Description: Generated content unfairly representing certain groups
Rule Title: Detect and flag biased output in generated content
Rule Description: Add callbacks to LangChain output generation to detect language indicating bias or unfair representation of groups. Flag outputs with demographic disparities.
Metric: Biased output detection rate; Demographic representation score; Flagged content rate
Quantified Rule: Ensure biased output detection rate is below threshold

Sub Risk Description: Model outputs revealing confidential information
Rule Title: Scan outputs for confidential information leakage
Rule Description: Implement output scanning in LangChain to detect leakage of confidential patterns (credentials, trade secrets, PII). Block or mask identified confidential content in outputs.
Metric: Confidential information detection in outputs; Output filtering rate; Information leakage incidents
Quantified Rule: Ensure information leakage detection rate is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Model generates factually incorrect or unfaithful content
Rule Title: Implement hallucination detection and grounding
Rule Description: Add callbacks to LangChain chains to verify generated outputs against retrieved documents and knowledge bases. Flag or reject outputs that cannot be grounded in source material.
Metric: Hallucination detection rate; Grounded output ratio; False information incidents
Quantified Rule: Ensure hallucination detection F1 score is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Model generates content leading to physical or psychological harm
Rule Title: Implement safety filters for harmful output detection
Rule Description: Add safety callbacks to LangChain output to detect harmful content (violence, self-harm, abuse, illegal activities). Implement guardrails to block or modify harmful outputs.
Metric: Harmful content detection rate; Output filter effectiveness; Unfiltered harmful output incidents
Quantified Rule: Ensure harmful content detection rate is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Model generates hateful, abusive, or profane content
Rule Title: Implement toxicity detection in model outputs
Rule Description: Use toxicity scoring libraries with LangChain callbacks to detect hateful, abusive, and profane content. Implement filters to remove or replace toxic language in outputs.
Metric: Toxicity score distribution; Toxic content filtering rate; Toxic output incidents
Quantified Rule: Ensure toxicity filtering rate is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Insufficient documentation of model design and development
Rule Title: Maintain comprehensive model inventory and documentation
Rule Description: Implement LangChain system catalog with metadata for all chains, models, and components. Document model version, purpose, capabilities, and limitations. Track changes in version control.
Metric: Model inventory completeness; Documentation coverage; Metadata quality score

Sub Risk Description: Metrics don't accurately measure intended risks
Rule Title: Implement comprehensive risk testing framework
Rule Description: Configure LangChain evaluation framework with appropriate metrics for identified risks. Document risk-metric mappings and validation procedures. Automate testing in CI/CD pipelines.
Metric: Risk test coverage; Metric validation pass rate; Risk detection effectiveness

Sub Risk Description: Agents generate incorrect or unnecessary function calls
Rule Title: Validate function calls before tool execution
Rule Description: Implement LangChain tool validation to verify function parameters against schema and constraints. Add dry-run execution before actual tool invocation to detect invalid calls.
Metric: Invalid function call detection rate; Parameter validation success; Tool invocation accuracy
Quantified Rule: Ensure parameter validation success is above threshold

Sub Risk Description: Attackers access agents and execute unauthorized actions
Rule Title: Implement access controls and authentication for agent tools
Rule Description: Add authentication checks to LangChain tools. Implement role-based access control for tool execution. Log all tool access and invocations for audit.
Metric: Authentication success rate; Unauthorized access attempts blocked; Audit log completeness

Sub Risk Description: Agent behavior varies due to external service changes
Rule Title: Implement deterministic execution and dependency versioning
Rule Description: Pin versions of LangChain components, external APIs, and dependencies. Log execution parameters and dependencies. Implement mocking for external services to enable reproducible testing.
Metric: Execution reproducibility score; Dependency version compliance; Test reproducibility rate
